animationSpeedLimitReached.value: Animation speed limit reached! Current animation speed reduced to {{percent}}% normal.

playArea.value:
There is a toolbox of circuit elements on the left, and a construction area in the center, where
  you can connect circuit elements to form a circuit. On the right, there is another toolbox with 
  sensors you can 
  use to measure properties like voltage and current.

controlArea.value:
{ $advancedControls ->
  [present] Show the current as the flow of electrons or conventional current. Show labels or values on circuit 
              elements. Additionally, change wire resistivity, battery internal resistance, or add real light bulbs 
              to the circuit element toolbox.
  *[absent] Show the current as the flow of electrons or conventional current. Show labels or values on circuit elements.
}

currentDetails.value: Currently, no circuit elements are in the construction area.

interactionHint.value: Add circuit elements to the construction area, and connect them to begin.

accessibleHelpText.value: Select the view type for circuit elements
Show the circuit elements like they would look in real life.
Show the circuit elements like they would look in a schematic circuit diagram.
Drag this tool to the circuit to create a new { a11y_circuitElement_accessibleName }.
